comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Maurice Francis Egan (1852 – January 15, 1924) was an American writer and diplomat. He was a prolific writer and had a long and successful career as a Catholic journalist, literary critic, and novelist. He was a professor of English at two universities, and served as United States Ambassador to Denmark. No mention of the wife.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Bain's other photo of the Egans is nearly identical:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5853211148/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Maurice Francis Egan was married to Katharine Mullin of Philadelphia in 1880; they had at least three children; she died in 1921.
